abstract: AT&T wasn’t prepared for all the iPhone users on its network in Austin, Tex., during the South by Southwest festival last weekend.
snippet: AT&T wasn’t prepared for all the iPhone users on its network in Austin, Tex., during the South by Southwest festival last weekend.
lead_paragraph: Mobile innovators are making the most out of the hordes of digerati in Austin. The interactive portion of South by Southwest — there is a music portion too — included announcements of custom versions of nightlife games and iPhone applications to dazzle tech-savvy attendees.

headline.main: ‘Call Failed’ Feature Revealed at SXSW Gathering
